title: Warrior Princess Sivir
body:
Hey Riot, I bought the Warrior Princess Sivir skin Yesterday and it's picture out of game shows her differently than what she is in the game. In the game she is holding a weapon that is shaped like a circle but the skin picture shows her holding a different weapon entirely. I bought the skin because I thought the **weapon was boss**, but when in game it wasn't the same and I was pretty let down. (http://s3.amazonaws.com/leaguesales/images/imgs/000/000/091/original/warrior-princess-sivir-02.png?1452570157) I'm not sure if you guys are aware of this, but I just thought I would let you know because I'm sure others like me are out there that have done the same thing. I wrote a ticket to you guys yesterday as soon as I discovered this and I was told to come here because they couldn't act on that type of issue (refund/fix the skin guarantee). I am hoping one of these can occur as technically I didn't receive what was advertised.
Thanks for the awesome game, Nick  :)  {{champion:15}}

replies.body: But it wouldn't be a warrior princess skin if she didn't have a giant version of Xena's weapon! I only got it because it makes Sivir into Xena :P
If you must know that splash art is the chinese league of legends splash art, I completely agree that riot should change the ingame visual.

The in-game visual was changed with her rework.
The splash art is out of date.

Besides Warrior Princess Sivir is a reference to Xena, her weapon is circular not four pointed like the old splash.

I got Xena skin as a Christmas present from rito a while back.
Needs the Xena battlecry.
I almost made the same mistake, I never liked Xena, but the splash sivir looks amazing, i want that sivir.
Global Unification, probs be changed soon.

You should check out the youtube Skin Spotlight before buying a skin to see if you actually like it or not.

The splash art for Sivir's skins are all out dated, they weren't updated when she got her rework sometime back which is when they changed her weapon to be more like Xena Warrior Princess'.
